item.title: CTF InterIUT 2020 - OSINT & SE (aka the world worst phishing)
item.description: The CTF Inter IUT is an initiative started a few years ago by the ENSIBS school. Being online and open to all this year, we decided with a small group of friends to take a look at the different challenges. This post explains the solution of the challenge “La DGSE, c’est moi” on OSINT and Social Engineering topics.
